0.title: The Shoe Store
0.description: An ecommerce website made using HTML, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript to deliver a robust, scalable, and visually appealing platform for online shoe shopping.

1.title: CryptoTree DAPP
1.description: A crowdfunding decentralized app made using React JS is a platform built on Sepolia blockchain technology that helps collect funds for the plantation of trees and stoping deforestation.

2.title: ProBoost
2.description: This is a web-based productivity boosting app built with React JS It allows users to create and manage tasks, set deadlines, and track progress. OpenAI API
